name: Dr. Rajul misra (Convener)
title: HOD, EE Deptt.
bio: Dr. Rajul Misra brings over 26 years of expertise in electrical machines, with more than 25 peer-reviewed research publications. As Head of the Electrical Engineering Department, he champions cutting-edge research and academic excellence in power systems and machine design.

name: Dr. Manoj Kr. Singh (Co-convener)
title: Associate Professor, CSE Deptt.
bio: Dr. Manoj Kr. Singh has over 18 years of experience specializing in hyperspectral image classification, and he has authored more than 25 research papers. His work drives advances in computational imaging and AI-driven analysis.
